thread.title: Vietnam to Ban State-Owned Firms From Investing in Certain Sectors
thread.title_full: Vietnam to Ban State-Owned Firms From Investing in Certain Sectors - WSJ

author: Vu Trong Khanh
title: Vietnam to Ban State-Owned Firms From Investing in Certain Sectors
text:
HANOIâ€”Vietnam will ban state-owned enterprises from making fresh investments in real estate, banks, insurance firms and stock markets from December, according to a government decree issued this week, as the country continues its efforts to reform its troubled state sector.
State-owned businesses wishing to invest in these areas must obtain permission from the prime minister, according to the decree, and will have to divest their...
